comments:
I20030723

When I picked up this build, I used a clean/new workspace.  I pulled in the UI 
projects from CVS and brought over all other projects as binary plug-ins (I 
may have done this in the other order - binaries first and CVS next).  After I 
had shutdown, I had the following crash in my .log file.  I've tried to 
reproduce it and have been unsuccessful.

!MESSAGE Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Jul 23, 2003 15:24:35.337
!MESSAGE 5
!STACK 0
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Path.append(Path.java:194)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.windowProc(Display.java:2713)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.win32.OS.DispatchMessageW(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.win32.OS.DispatchMessage(OS.java:1338)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1876)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:848)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:2188)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1878)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:1680)

(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:324)

	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:583)

The code that does the append is

Platform.getLocation().append(nameValue)

so this would be an exception in the append method for Path. Moving to Core 
but knowing the name that caused this problem would be a great help.

Fixed and released.  The optimization for appending a single segment did not
handle the empty UNC path.  The following code reproduces the bug:

Path.ROOT.append(new Path("//"));

Please reopen if you discover that it was a different case.

New tests added to PathTest.testAppend
